ing: 1 (.7 ounce) package dry Italian-style salad dressing mix
des: "This recipe is quick and delicious!  I use the broth as an au jus with the sandwiches. Yummy Yummy!"
ins: Combine roast beef, dry dressing mix, pepperoncini and beef broth in a slow cooker.  Cook over medium-high heat until hot, about 1 hour
